hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
if [ "$MANUAL_TRIGGER_JOB" == "true" ]; then #Disable MCU SW dl, if triggered by a certain upstream job echo ************************ echo Disabling MCU SW upgrade export mcuSwDlFlag=YES echo ************************
else #Default value export mcuSwDlFlag=YES fi
export branch=HZSCM_TEST export isThisLrc=YES
export scriptDir=C_Platform/DSPHWAPI export mitDir=C_Platform/DSPHWAPI export use_runTests=YES
export saveEnergySaveTheWorld=YES
#Get a right ECL if [ -d ECL ];then rm -fr ECL fi #disable command prints set +x svn export --username=ca_pscilrc --password=fCfYAXbr --non-interactive --trust-server-cert --force https://svne1.access.nsn.com/isource/svnroot/BTS_SCM_PS/ECL/$branch/ECL_HWAPI -r $ECL_REVISION ECL echo ecl revision $ECL_REVISION svn info --username=ca_pscilrc --password=fCfYAXbr --non-interactive --trust-server-cert https://svne1.access.nsn.com/isource/svnroot/BTS_SCM_PS/ECL/$branch/ECL_HWAPI -r $ECL_REVISION | egrep -v 'Repo|Revi|Text Last|Path' > ECL_revision_info.txt
svn export --username=ca_pscilrc --password=fCfYAXbr --non-interactive --trust-server-cert --force https://svne1.access.nsn.com/isource/svnroot/BTS_T_PS_TOOLS/nibbles/branches/filelogger/trunk/tryme/nibbles_static
svn export --username=ca_pscilrc --password=fCfYAXbr --non-interactive --trust-server-cert https://svne1.access.nsn.com/isource/svnroot/BTS_SCM_PS/branches/ps_rel_ci/jenkins/scripts_lrc/DSPTargetTest.sh
svn export --username=ca_pscilrc --password=fCfYAXbr --non-interactive --trust-server-cert --force https://svne1.access.nsn.com/isource/svnroot/LRC_SC_UPHWAPI/HZSCM_TEST/trunk/C_Platform/DSPHWAPI/TestScripts/Utils
#These "connectedTargetRelayX" definitions comes from Jenkins Node config. echo "Relay parameters which are tied to Jenkins node:" if [ "$connectedTargetRelayNbr" != "" ]; then export relayNbr=$connectedTargetRelayNbr else export relayNbr=0 fi
if [ "$connectedTargetRelayType" != "" ]; then export powerSwitchType=$connectedTargetRelayType else export powerSwitchType=MOXA fi
if [ "$connectedTargetRelayIP" != "" ]; then export powerSwitchIp=$connectedTargetRelayIP else export powerSwitchIp=192.168.255.254 fi echo "Relay nbr: " $connectedTargetRelayNbr echo "Relay type: " $connectedTargetRelayType echo "Relay IP: " $connectedTargetRelayIP
if [ "$slave" == "PSCI_MAIN_LSP_AXM_RTHWAPI_LTE" ]; then export sendEmails=YES #export mcuSwDlFlag=NO export multipleFspSwDlFlag=NO export isThisLrc=YES export swDlFepMode=YES export needsRTHWAPITestCodes=YES #export powerSwitchType=MOXA_INV #export powerSwitchIp=ourdpsciv341:8080 export relayNbr=$connectedTargetRelayNbr export binDirRtQt=C_Platform/DSPHWAPI/Bin/Nyquist export binDirBwQt=C_Platform/DSPHWAPI/Bin/Nyquist export zipDirRt=C_Platform/DSPHWAPI/Bin/Kepler export zipDirBw=Out echo "**** Powering on module..." python Utils/RemotePowerSwitch.py --set=$relayNbr --state=1 --type=$powerSwitchType --ip=$powerSwitchIp sleep 240 echo "*******************************" #./DSPTargetTest.sh KEP LTE $slave --target=0x1200 --input=../../DSPHWAPI_RT/TestCodes/ --testSetXml=./LRC/sctParams/LrcLspAxmRtHwApiReleaseTests.xml --preConf=./LRC/lrcLspAXMRecover --noInit ./DSPTargetTest.sh KEP LTE $slave --target=0x1200 --input=../../DSPHWAPI_RT/TestCodes/ --testSetXml=./LRC/sctParams/LrcLspAxmRtHwApiReleaseTests.xml --noInit
elif [ "$slave" == "PSCI_MAIN_LSP_K2_RTHWAPI_LTE" ]; then export sendEmails=YES export multipleFspSwDlFlag=NO export isThisLrc=YES export swDlFepMode=YES export needsRTHWAPITestCodes=YES #export powerSwitchType=MOXA_INV #export powerSwitchIp=ourdpsciv341:8080 export relayNbr=$connectedTargetRelayNbr export binDirRtQt=C_Platform/DSPHWAPI/Bin/Nyquist export binDirBwQt=C_Platform/DSPHWAPI/Bin/Nyquist export zipDirRt=C_Platform/DSPHWAPI/Bin/Kepler export zipDirBw=Out echo "**** Powering on module..." python Utils/RemotePowerSwitch.py --set=$relayNbr --state=1 --type=$powerSwitchType --ip=$powerSwitchIp sleep 240 echo "*******************************" #./DSPTargetTest.sh KEP LTE $slave --target=0x1200 --input=../../DSPHWAPI_RT/TestCodes/ --testSetXml=./LRC/sctParams/LrcLspK2RtHwApiReleaseTests.xml --preConf=lrcLspK2ArmRecover --noInit ./DSPTargetTest.sh KEP LTE $slave --target=0x1200 --input=../../DSPHWAPI_RT/TestCodes/ --testSetXml=./LRC/sctParams/LrcLspK2RtHwApiReleaseTests.xml --noInit
else echo "testing under construction, slave: $slave" fi
if [ "$sendEmails" == "YES" ]; then svn export --non-interactive --trust-server-cert --username=ca_pscilrc --password=fCfYAXbr --force https://svne1.access.nsn.com/isource/svnroot/BTS_SCM_PS/branches/ps_rel_ci/jenkins/scripts_lrc/tcrs.py
python ./tcrs.py -s -x ./testdir/C_Platform/DSPHWAPI/TestScripts/"$slave"_results.xml -a ./testdir/C_Platform/DSPHWAPI/TestScripts/DSPHWAPI_CI_Contact_List.xml -i ${BUILD_ID} -t ${BUILD_TAG} -u ${BUILD_URL} fi

#!/bin/bash if [ -d testdir/C_Platform/DSPHWAPI/TestScripts/ ]; then cd testdir/C_Platform/DSPHWAPI/TestScripts/ #svn export --username=ps_rel_ci --password=df116d19 --force --non-interactive --trust-server-cert https://svne1.access.nsn.com/isource/svnroot/BTS_T_PS_TOOLS/bollox/trunk/bollox_static #./bollox_static $slave.log $slave.html zip logs.zip *.log fi
